recipe.title: Tandoori-Style Barbeque Sauce
ingredients: 1 large garlic clove, chopped and mashed with 1/2 teaspoon salt
instructions: In a small saucepan cook oil, paprika, cumin, cardamom, ginger, and cayenne over moderate heat until mixture begins to sizzle and cook, stirring, 1 minute more. In a bowl stir together remaining ingredients and salt to taste and stir in spice mixture until combined.

In a small saucepan cook oil, paprika, cumin, cardamom, ginger, and cayenne over moderate heat until mixture begins to sizzle and cook, stirring, 1 minute more. In a bowl stir together remaining ingredients and salt to taste and stir in spice mixture until combined.
